subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Without the injured Peyton Manning, most Colts fans expect the N.F.L. season to be a disaster. With 15 games to play, however, Indianapolis players and coaches are trying to regroup.
snippet: Without the injured Peyton Manning, most Colts fans expect the N.F.L. season to be a disaster. With 15 games to play, however, Indianapolis players and coaches are trying to regroup.
